newsitem.title: JAPAN: TIFFE euroyen,cash money market closed for holiday.
newsitem.headline: TIFFE euroyen,cash money market closed for holiday.

text.p: The TIFFE euroyen interest rate futures market and the Tokyo cash money market are both closed for a holiday on Tuesday and will reopen on Wednesday.
On Monday, the key December three-month euroyen interest rate futures contract settled up 0.02 at 98.98 on pre-holiday short-covering.

The cash benchmark three-month certificates of deposit (CD) were issued at 0.56 percent, unchanged from the previously issued rate. But the key overnight call rate rose to 0.50 percent from Friday's 0.48 percent on banks' fund raising demand ahead of the month end.
